message.content:
{
  "insights": [
    "No LLM response caused default wait; zero progress and profit.",
    "Absence of timeouts/fallbacks turns delays into full-day idle time.",
    "Health/integration status unclear; need early detection to avoid stalls."
  ],
  "memory_additions": [
    "Set 30m LLM timeout; auto-trigger fallback plan if breached.",
    "Prepare minimal fallback task list to run when LLM is silent.",
    "Retry LLM at 10m intervals up to 3 times; then execute fallback.",
    "Run a morning health-check for LLM/integrations before planning.",
    "Add a mid-day checkpoint to pivot if blocked or waiting."
  ],
  "risk_flags": [
    "Overreliance on LLM without SLA or timeout.",
    "Lost productivity from passive waiting.",
    "No automated monitoring of integration health."
  ],
  "next_day_hypotheses": [
    "Adding a 30m timeout + fallback will cut idle time and raise throughput.",
    "Morning health-checks will surface outages early and save the day.",
    "Capping retries at 3 balances responsiveness and avoids spinning.",
    "A mid-day checkpoint will catch stalls and enable course correction."
  ]
}

insights: No LLM response caused default wait; zero progress and profit.
Absence of timeouts/fallbacks turns delays into full-day idle time.
Health/integration status unclear; need early detection to avoid stalls.
memory_additions: Set 30m LLM timeout; auto-trigger fallback plan if breached.
Prepare minimal fallback task list to run when LLM is silent.
Retry LLM at 10m intervals up to 3 times; then execute fallback.
Run a morning health-check for LLM/integrations before planning.
Add a mid-day checkpoint to pivot if blocked or waiting.
risk_flags: Overreliance on LLM without SLA or timeout.
No automated monitoring of integration health.
next_day_hypotheses: Adding a 30m timeout + fallback will cut idle time and raise throughput.
Morning health-checks will surface outages early and save the day.
Capping retries at 3 balances responsiveness and avoids spinning.
A mid-day checkpoint will catch stalls and enable course correction.
